title: wrong total size and usage percentage
body:
sync client version 1.5.0 (build 1913) on windows displays a wrong storage and usage size. tested on multiple clients. server: raspberrypi with debian wheezy (current), apache2 (current), mysql (current)

$ df -h
filesystem      size  used avail use% mounted on
rootfs           58g   32g   24g  58% /
/dev/root        58g   32g   24g  58% /
devtmpfs        235m     0  235m   0% /dev
tmpfs            49m  212k   49m   1% /run
tmpfs           5.0m     0  5.0m   0% /run/lock
tmpfs            98m     0   98m   0% /run/shm
/dev/mmcblk0p1   56m   19m   38m  34% /boot
